text: Carlo Micheluzzi (1886–1973) was an Italian stage and film actor.Farrell & Puppa p.239 ==Selected filmography== * We Were Seven Widows (1939) * Before the Postman (1942) * C'è sempre un ma! (1942) * I Live as I Please (1942) * Love Story (1942) * The Lady Is Fickle (1942) * The Innkeeper (1944) * The Devil's Gondola (1946) * The Tyrant of Padua (1946) * Toto Tours Italy (1948) * Sul ponte dei sospiri (1953) ==References== ==Bibliography== * Joseph Farrell & Paolo Puppa. A History of Italian Theatre. Cambridge University Press, 2006. ==External links== * Category:1886 births Category:1973 deaths Category:Italian male film actors Category:Italian male stage actors Category:19th-century Neapolitan people
title: Carlo Micheluzzi
